name: Escaping Atlantis
description:
As you lift the powerful Artifact of Atlantis from its pillar - a dormant defense-system is activated. From every crack and crevise monsters spring forth.

Escape the ruins of the ancient city or die trying!

How to play:

  • Enemies will spawn for 45 seconds in each room. During this time, you have to kill as many of them as you can to collect score.
  • When the timer reach zero, new monsters will no longer spawn - so kill the remaining or get to the exit (but miss out on potential points)
  • Damage enemies with the artifacts strong beam. The artifact will need to be recharged eventually, so pick up the responder to regain the charge.
  • Every room will increase in difficulty, monsters will be increased in both numbers, damage, health and potential score.
  • Every fourth room gives you the ability to upgrade your character and the artifact. Your score will determine how many upgrades you can buy. 

Controls

WASD: Movement

Mouse move: Aim

Left mouse-button: Launch the Responder / Toggle beam

Space: Upgrade your abilities at the Fountain of Poseidon
